items.headline: Learn how to do UX Audits for finding usability issues with Neilsen's Heuristics, and improve your product's usability.

A deep dive into Nielsen's Heuristic which is a proven method to identify usability issues

items.headline: Learn to conduct Heuristic Evaluation to provide better UX & Usability in your product (Mobile Apps & Websites)!
objectives_summary: 1. This course will help you to understand usability and the ways to evaluate usability and UX of any user interface.
2. This course will teach you practical guidelines that you will be able to use immediately in your job to create world class products and interfaces.
3. Designers and product managers, who are looking for new career opportunities, would learn practical frameworks and techniques that will really prove useful in cracking the interviews.

items.headline: Gamification - engage your customers and win new audience.
objectives_summary: How to move from a task to a game: ABCs, theory, dependable solutions. The steps you should take to introduce gamification and see results.

Methods and rules for engaging clients in gamification. How to encourage some behaviors and routines and make customers want to start their day by checking updates on your website, buy your products or drop by your café more often.
How do H&M, Honda, Nike and other big players use gamification?

items.title: Emotional Design Thinking & Design Psychology Masterclass
items.headline: A power-packed masterclass on emotional design thinking and design psychology from Starter to Guru !
objectives_summary: Design Psychology: The roots of design psychology and its practical applications in design.
Emotional Design:  How to add an emotional experience to design, how to enhance it using other elements and how to maintain design coherence.
Design Thinking:  Understanding and adding an X factor appeal in design. Understanding conscious and unconscious appeal

items.headline: Optimizing user efficiency in software and website user interface design
objectives_summary: Upon completing this course, you will be able to apply 24 user interface design guidelines for optimizing user efficiency, and apply three evaluation techniques for assessing and refining the efficiency of potential user interface designs
In this course you will learn:
How to know when user efficiency should be your key usability goal
